comment: The professor is a nice women and passionate about what she teaches however only allowed two absents, yet wanted the students to leave campus and meet elsewhere for class four times which isn't always possible for students especially those who have a class on campus immediately after that, don't have a car or students who want a classroom setting.

She's ok, not great. Requires reading and 1 quiz a week, plus a lot of silly group discussion. To her benefit, 2120 is kind of a dumb class anyways so the material is common sense boring stuff. I personally would take someone else, but it's an easy A class for the most part and she's not awful.
